title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.5 - Notice of late payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.5 - Notice of late payment

State Regulations

Each milk dealer shall notify the commissioner in writing
of any milk dealer who has failed to pay him for milk on or before the final
date prescribed by this Part and whose current purchases of milk are required
to be made on a cash-on-delivery basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
44.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
